Articles.Content: I consider that the state of thrust from the time of saving is conserved, no animated "ignition" procedure and a loss of speed, please.

I think he's talking about quicksaving whilst mid-burn.  When you re-load the engine ignites as though it was not already ignited.  Should have posted to the feature request section but I don't think anyone else will have noticed or will care either way.
some times when i use dual mode jet engine when i switch to dry mode i get about 0.1 thrust. Is this your Bug

I recently had this bug.  It reloaded without ignition, followed by full ignition and losing a part of the spacecraft (no idea if a strut disappeared as well, it happened to fast to tell).  Best guess is that it is a bug due to Unity (which handles the physics), but that is impossible to tell outside of Squad.
